verses.verse: וַיֹּסִ֙פוּ֙ <S%H3254><s%> again בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּתְּנֵ֧ם <S%H5414><s%> delivered יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years פ

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֧ד <S%H259><s%> And there was a certain מִצָּרְעָ֛ה <S%H6881><s%> of Zorah מִמִּשְׁפַּ֥חַת <S%H4940><s%> of the family הַדָּנִ֖י <S%H1839><s%> of the Danites וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name מָנ֑וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> [was] Manoah וְאִשְׁתּ֥וֹ <S%H802><s%> and his wife עֲקָרָ֖ה <S%H6135><s%> [was] barren וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יָלָֽדָה׃ <S%H3205><s%> and bare

וַיֵּרָ֥א <S%H7200><s%> appeared מַלְאַךְ־ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> unto the woman וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלֶ֗יהָ <S%H413><s%> to her הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now אַתְּ־ <S%H859><s%> you עֲקָרָה֙ <S%H6135><s%> unto her Behold now thou [art] barren וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יָלַ֔דְתְּ <S%H3205><s%> and bearest וְהָרִ֖ית <S%H2029><s%> not but thou shalt conceive וְיָלַ֥דְתְּ <S%H3205><s%> and bear בֵּֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> a son

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now הִשָּׁ֣מְרִי <S%H8104><s%> Now therefore beware נָ֔א <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תִּשְׁתִּ֖י <S%H8354><s%> I pray thee and drink יַ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> not wine וְשֵׁכָ֑ר <S%H7941><s%> nor strong drink וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תֹּאכְלִ֖י <S%H398><s%> and eat כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any טָמֵֽא׃ <S%H2931><s%> not any unclean

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנָּ֨ךְ <S%H2009><s%> behold הָרָ֜ה <S%H2029><s%> been וְיֹלַ֣דְתְּ <S%H3205><s%> and bear בֵּ֗ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וּמוֹרָה֙ <S%H4177><s%> and no razor לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> shall come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> on his head כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נְזִ֧יר <S%H5139><s%> shall be a Nazarite אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> unto God יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> for the child מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַבָּ֑טֶן <S%H990><s%> from the womb וְה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he יָחֵ֛ל <S%H2490><s%> and he shall begin לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <S%H3467><s%> to deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines

וַתָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> came הָאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> Then the woman וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and told לְאִישָׁהּ֮ <S%H376><s%> her husband לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> A man הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> came אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me וּמַרְאֵ֕הוּ <S%H4758><s%> unto me and his countenance כְּמַרְאֵ֛ה <S%H4758><s%> [was] like the countenance מַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> of an angel הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God נוֹרָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> terrible מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> very וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor שְׁאִלְתִּ֙יהוּ֙ <S%H7592><s%> but I asked אֵֽי־ <S%H335><s%> where מִזֶּ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> he ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> he me his name לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor הִגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> him not whence he [was] neither told לִֽי׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> But he said לִ֔י הִנָּ֥ךְ <S%H2009><s%> Behold הָרָ֖ה <S%H2029><s%> been וְיֹלַ֣דְתְּ <S%H3205><s%> and bear בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וְעַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> and now אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תִּשְׁתִּ֣י ׀ <S%H8354><s%> nor strong drink יַ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> no wine וְשֵׁכָ֗ר <S%H7941><s%> and now drink וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תֹּֽאכְלִי֙ <S%H398><s%> neither eat כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any טֻמְאָ֔ה <S%H2932><s%> any unclean כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נְזִ֤יר <S%H5139><s%> shall be a Nazarite אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> to God יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> [thing] for the child מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַבֶּ֖טֶן <S%H990><s%> from the womb עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to the day מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4194><s%> of his death פ

וַיֶּעְתַּ֥ר <S%H6279><s%> intreated מָנ֛וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> Then Manoah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> O אֲדוֹנָ֔י <S%H136><s%> my Lord אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֞ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom שָׁלַ֗חְתָּ <S%H7971><s%> which thou didst send יָבוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> come again נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> let עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> again אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H413><s%> about וְיוֹרֵ֕נוּ <S%H3384><s%> unto us and teach מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what נַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> us what we shall do לַנַּ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> unto the child הַיּוּלָּֽד׃ <S%H3205><s%> that shall be born

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> And God בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> to the voice מָנ֑וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> of Manoah וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> came again מַלְאַךְ֩ <S%H4397><s%> and the angel הָאֱלֹהִ֨ים <S%H430><s%> of God ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> unto the woman וְהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> she יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> as she sat בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field וּמָנ֥וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> but Manoah אִישָׁ֖הּ <S%H376><s%> her husband אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else עִמָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַתְּמַהֵר֙ <S%H4116><s%> made haste הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H376><s%> her husband וַתָּ֖רָץ <S%H7323><s%> and ran וַתַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> and shewed לְאִישָׁ֑הּ <S%H802><s%> And the woman וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold נִרְאָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> hath appeared אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto him Behold the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> unto me that came בַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto me the [other] day אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיָּ֛קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> Then מָנ֖וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> And Manoah אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the man וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֗וֹ הַאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> are you הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto him [Art] thou the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who דִּבַּ֥רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> that spakest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> his wife וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מָנ֔וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> And Manoah עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> come to pass דְבָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H1697><s%> Now let thy words מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become מִשְׁפַּט־ <S%H4941><s%> How shall we order הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> the child וּמַעֲשֵֽׂהוּ׃ <S%H4639><s%> and [how] shall we do

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מָנ֑וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> unto Manoah מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> i אָמַ֥רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> Of all that I said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> unto the woman תִּשָּׁמֵֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> let her beware

מִכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that יֵצֵא֩ <S%H3318><s%> of any [thing] that cometh מִגֶּ֨פֶן <S%H1612><s%> of the vine הַיַּ֜יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> should not תֹאכַ֗ל <S%H398><s%> She may not eat וְיַ֤יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine וְשֵׁכָר֙ <S%H7941><s%> or strong drink אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תֵּ֔שְׁתְּ <S%H8354><s%> neither let her drink וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any טֻמְאָ֖ה <S%H2932><s%> any unclean אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תֹּאכַ֑ל <S%H398><s%> nor eat כֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> i צִוִּיתִ֖יהָ <S%H6680><s%> [thing] all that I commanded תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> her let her observe

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מָנ֖וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> And Manoah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> unto the angel יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נַעְצְרָה־ <S%H6113><s%> I pray thee let us detain נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please אוֹתָ֔ךְ <S%H853><s%> וְנַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> thee until we shall have made ready לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> for גְּדִ֥י <S%H1423><s%> kid עִזִּֽים׃ <S%H5795><s%> goat

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said מַלְאַ֨ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מָנ֗וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> unto Manoah אִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if תַּעְצְרֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H6113><s%> Though thou detain לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֹכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> me I will not eat בְּלַחְמֶ֔ךָ <S%H3899><s%> of thy bread וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> thou wilt offer עֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> it unto the LORD תַּעֲלֶ֑נָּה <S%H5927><s%> thou must offer כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> knew מָנ֔וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> For Manoah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> not that he [was] an angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מָנ֛וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> And Manoah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> unto the angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> What שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> What [is] thy name כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> come to pass [דִבְרֵיךָ כ] (דְבָרְךָ֖ <S%H1697><s%> act ק) וְכִבַּדְנֽוּךָ׃ <S%H3513><s%> we may do thee honour

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why זֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> you תִּשְׁאַ֣ל <S%H7592><s%> unto him Why askest לִשְׁמִ֑י <S%H8034><s%> thou thus after my name וְהוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he פֶֽלִאי׃ <S%H6383><s%> secret ס

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took מָנ֜וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> So Manoah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּדִ֤י <S%H1423><s%> kid הָעִזִּים֙ <S%H5795><s%> goat וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> with a meat offering וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> and offered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַצּ֖וּר <S%H6697><s%> [it] upon a rock לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וּמַפְלִ֣א <S%H6381><s%> wondrously לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> and [the angel] did וּמָנ֥וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> and Manoah וְאִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> and his wife רֹאִֽים׃ <S%H7200><s%> looked on

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> came בַעֲל֨וֹת <S%H5927><s%> went up הַלַּ֜הַב <S%H3851><s%> For it came to pass when the flame מֵעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> from הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> from off the altar הַשָּׁמַ֔יְמָה <S%H8064><s%> toward heaven וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> ascended מַלְאַךְ־ <S%H4397><s%> that the angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּלַ֣הַב <S%H3851><s%> in the flame הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar וּמָנ֤וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> And Manoah וְאִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <S%H802><s%> and his wife רֹאִ֔ים <S%H7200><s%> looked on וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> [it] and fell on עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> their faces אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> to the ground

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָ֤סַף <S%H3254><s%> did no more עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> again מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> But the angel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְהֵרָאֹ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> appear אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מָנ֣וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> to Manoah וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> and to his wife אָ֚ז <S%H227><s%> Then יָדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> knew מָנ֔וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> Then Manoah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> that he [was] an angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מָנ֛וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> And Manoah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> unto his wife מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> We shall surely נָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> die כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God רָאִֽינוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> because we have seen

וַתֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ל֣וֹ אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <S%H802><s%> But his wife לוּ֩ <S%H3863><s%> unto him If חָפֵ֨ץ <S%H2654><s%> were pleased יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לַהֲמִיתֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H4191><s%> to kill לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor לָקַ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> us he would not have received מִיָּדֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3027><s%> at our hands עֹלָ֣ה <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering וּמִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> and a meat offering וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor הֶרְאָ֖נוּ <S%H7200><s%> neither would he have shewed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְכָעֵ֕ת <S%H6256><s%> us all these [things] nor would as at this time לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor הִשְׁמִיעָ֖נוּ <S%H8085><s%> have told כָּזֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> us [such things] as these

וַתֵּ֤לֶד <S%H3205><s%> bare הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> And the woman בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שִׁמְשׁ֑וֹן <S%H8123><s%> Samson וַיִּגְדַּ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> grew הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> and the child וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <S%H1288><s%> blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD

וַתָּ֙חֶל֙ <S%H2490><s%> began ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> And the Spirit יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְפַעֲמ֖וֹ <S%H6470><s%> to move him at times בְּמַחֲנֵה־ <S%H4264><s%> in the camp דָ֑ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between צָרְעָ֖ה <S%H6881><s%> between Zorah וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between אֶשְׁתָּאֹֽל׃ <S%H847><s%> and Eshtaol פ
